document.heading: EDUCATION IN PARTNERSHIP WITH TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION ESTABLISHMENT ACT CAPITALIZATION AMENDMENT ACT OF 1991, BILL 9-239

meta.search-text: E ROLLMENT(S) kwiktag ® 103 246 653 0 0 0 Enrotled Original AN ACT D,C, ACT 9-161 IN THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA FEBRUARY 21, 1992 To amend the Education in Partnership with Technology Corporation Establishment Act of 1986 to allow certain donations from private sources to be treated as contributions to capitalization. BE IT ENACTED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this act may be cited as the "Education in Partnership with Technology Corporation Establishment Act of 1986 Capitalization Amendment Act of 1992 Sec. 2. Section 9(4) of the Education in Partnership with Section Technology Corporation Establishment Act of 1986, effective February 24, 31-2508 1987 (D.C. Law 6-170; D.C. Code §31-2508(4 is amended by adding the phrase "of equipment, or in-kind services, or other cash or non-cash contributions" after the phrase "a commitment for funding Sec. 3. This act shall take effect after a 30-day period of Congressional review following approval by the Mayor (or in the event of veto by the Mayor, action by the Council of the District of Columbia to override the veto) as provided in section 602(c)(1) of the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Reorganization Act, approved December 24, 1973 (87 Stat. 813; D.C.
